      • scanCommits

        boolean scanCommits(GitBranchConfiguration branchConfiguration,
                    java.util.function.Predicate<org.eclipse.jgit.revwalk.RevCommit> scanFunction)
        Scans the whole history of a repository.
        Parameters:
        branchConfiguration - Repository branch to scan
        scanFunction - Function that scans the commits. Returns true if the scan must not go on, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if at least one call to scanFunction has returned true.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • projectSync

        Ack projectSync(Project project,
                GitSynchronisationRequest request)
        Synchronises the Git repository attached to this project.
        Parameters:
        project - Project
        request - Sync request
        Returns:
        Result. The synchronisation will occur asynchronously, but the acknowledgment returns if the project did contain a Git configuration or not.

      • sync

        java.util.Optional<java.util.concurrent.Future<?>> sync(GitConfiguration gitConfiguration,
                                                        GitSynchronisationRequest request)
        Synchronises the Git repository attached to this configuration.
        Parameters:
        gitConfiguration - Configuration to sync
        request - Sync request
        Returns:
        Result. The synchronisation will occur asynchronously, but the acknowledgment returns if the synchronisation was actually launched.

      • getProjectGitSyncInfo

        GitSynchronisationInfo getProjectGitSyncInfo(Project project)
        Gets the Git synchronisation information.
        Parameters:
        project - Project configured for Git
        Returns:
        Synchronisation information
